original_title: Rocco's Back to America for More Adventures
overview: In "Rocco's Back To America For More Adventures," iconic pornographer Rocco Siffredi revisits Porn Valley to fulfill the fantasies of top U.S. XXX talent. The Italian Stallion meets six daring starlets eager to enjoy his esteemed erotic prowess firsthand, and behind-the-scenes heat leads to profound sexual thrills. Each segment features an insightful interview along with the wild, limit-pushing fun!
tagline: Rocco's Back To America For More Adventures
title: Rocco's Back to America for More Adventures
